definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means
let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
have no way out/have no alternative/abbr. to 無奈|无奈[wu2 nai4]
what course to follow/what path to take

After graduation, he was appointed as a teacher in Beijing Normal University in 1981.
sentences.chinese: 1981年畢業後何教授來到北師大任教。

sentences.english: Any student who tries to cheat while the examiner is watching is playing with fire.

sentences.english: In 1986, Huang Ho marriage and families, the bad and still not changed.

sentences.english: There was no way that the son would leave his aged father just like that.

sentences.english: Why the Buddha? Because Buddhas, Tathagatas, have cosmic bodies, and so enter into the meditating mind of each sentient being.
sentences.chinese: 所以者何？諸佛如來，是法界身，入一切衆生心想中。

sentences.english: Mr. He is the kindest teacher that I have ever had.
sentences.chinese: 何老師是我曾經碰到過的最仁慈的教師。

sentences.english: I will dare any danger for my people.
sentences.chinese: 爲人民，我敢擔任何風險。

sentences.english: From Thee have flowed, as from a pleasant river.
sentences.chinese: 浩如河江，流來活力何豐盈。

sentences.english: I don't really agree with Professor He's views on this point.
sentences.chinese: 何教授在這個問題上的觀點我不太認同。

definition: (classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
